messages.ADD_TRIGGER_SUCCESS: Sure, I guess I'll send a `%WC%` message when you say `%WC%`, if you're lucky.
messages.CHOOSE: %WC%, but it's not like I care or anything.
messages.COMMAND_USAGE: Could you be any worse at using `%WC%`?!
messages.EMOTE_STATS_TITLE: You sure do use these a lot:
messages.FAMILY_CREATED: You want to make a Family? Nobody would ever join something like that! Would they?
messages.FAMILY_JOIN_CODE: **Join Code for %WC%**%BR%`%WC%`%BR%_Use it to join a server to the Family, or whatever, like I care._
messages.FAMILY_SERVER_LIST: The "%WC%" Family contains the following servers:
messages.FEEDBACK_COOLDOWN: Oh please, hold your applause for a few minutes! Could you do that?
messages.FEEDBACK_SENT: You're kidding me! Fine, I'll write this down, but just this once.
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_CREATED: Yeah, okay, use **%WC%** and just see what happens.
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_DESTROYED: You finally got rid of that piece of trash!
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_DUPLICATE: Are you stupid?! This looks just like **%WC%**!
messages.FORUM_WEAPON_UPDATED: Great, the link changed, but the name stayed the same.
messages.FORUM_WEAPONS_PRUNED: I took care of **%WC%** unused Forum Weapons, I hope you didn't need them...
messages.INVALID_TRIGGER_TYPE: Wrong, baka! You need to use %WC%
messages.ITEM_ADDED: You're making me do even MORE? Will you ever do anything yourself?!
messages.ITEM_REMOVED: For crying out loud, just do whatever you want. I'll go delete "%WC%".
messages.LIST_CREATED: Oh good, the clutz is making lists now!
messages.LIST_DELETED: Got rid of that stinky old list, `%WC%`.
messages.MUSIC_ADDED_TO_QUEUE: Your taste in music is whatever, but sure, I can play that later.
messages.MUSIC_PLAYING_PLAYLIST: Popping in the world's okayest playlist, `%WC%`.
messages.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_CONVERTED: Yep, turned that mess into `%WC%` with `%WC%` tracks!
messages.MUSIC_QUEUE_CLEARED: Why do _I_ have to clean up your mess?
messages.MUSIC_QUEUE_SHUFFLED: Look at what you did now, it's all over the floor!
messages.MUSIC_QUEUE_REVERSED: Talking backwards now? Maybe I'll be able to understand you better.
messages.RESET_EMOTE_STATS: BAAKA! I was gonna use those someday!
messages.SENT_PRIVATE_MESSAGE: Check your DMs, _not like I want to help or anything, but..._
messages.TALLY_CURRENT_VALUE: Since I keep having to listen to you try to count, I've heard `%WC%` exactly `%WC%` times.
messages.TALLY_LIST: I've counted these up since you can't:
messages.TIMER_STARTED: I have to remind you about things, too?! Fine, whatever, see you in %WC%.

errors.ALREADY_EXISTS: Dimwit, you told me about that last time!
errors.CANNOT_DELETE: No! You can't have it! It stays with me!
errors.CHANNEL_NOT_FOUND: And where exactly do you expect me to look?
errors.FAMILY_ALREADY_EXISTS: You already own a family with that name! Please choose a different name.
errors.FAMILY_ALREADY_JOINED: This server already belongs to that family!
errors.FAMILY_INVALID_DETAIL: Invalid Family name or Join Code!
errors.FAMILY_NOT_JOINED: That server has not joined that Family!
errors.FAMILY_MEMBER_MAXIMUM_REACHED: That family has reached the maximum number of servers!
errors.FAMILY_MAXIMUM_REACHED: You can only join up to 3 families!
errors.FAMILY_SERVER_LIST_EMPTY: This Family does not contain any servers.
errors.FORUM_WEAPON_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Stop! I can't take it anymore! 100 is way too many!
errors.GUILD_REQUIRED: That command must be run on a server.
errors.HANGMAN_NOT_STARTED: There isn't a Hangman game running! Try starting one.
errors.HEY_THERE: Hi. Try `%WC% help`, or not, see if I care.
errors.INCORRECT_ITEM_COUNT: You've supplied an incorrect number of thingz!
errors.ITEMS_NOT_FOUND: You made me search EVERYWHERE, and I couldn't find a single thing!
errors.MUSIC_NOT_IN_CHANNEL: I'm sorry, do you hear something? I don't hear anything. Maybe a faint buzzing sound.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_ALREADY_EXISTS: That one's too familiar, try again.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_DOESNT_EXIST: I have no idea what you're saying.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_NAME_INVALID: Do you expect me to speak your l33t alien language?
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_NAME_MISSING: What's it called? I need the details!
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in that Playlist on this page.
errors.MUSIC_PLAYLIST_TRACK_MAXIMUM_REACHED: Playlists currently support a max of 50 tracks.
errors.MUSIC_QUEUE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue.
errors.MUSIC_QUEUE_PAGE_EMPTY: There are no tracks in the Queue on this page.
errors.MUSIC_WRONG_INPUT: Please enter a media URL or playlist name!
errors.NO_PERMISSION_BOT: Look, after all I've done for you, you owe me one!
errors.NO_PERMISSION_USER: NO WAY! It's for your own good! _Not like I care or anything..._
errors.RESERVED_WORD: Sorry, you can't use that totally awesome name!
errors.SERVER_FAMILY_LIST_EMPTY: This server does not belong to a Family.
errors.TRACK_NOT_PLAYING: There isn't a track playing right now.
errors.WRONG_USAGE: Out of all the people in the world, I'm stuck with you! Baka! You don't even know how to use that command properly! Must I do everything myself?!
